short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install the extension to reply to your reviews from different sites without leaving the reviews platform.
short.it: Installa l'estensione per rispondere alle tue recensioni su differenti canali senza uscire dalla piattaforma delle recensioni.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Reviews, you can manage all your reviews from one platform. 

Install the extension to reply to your reviews from different sites without leaving the reviews platform ever again. Find more information on how to download the extension at this link:
https://support.manageyourlocation.com/hc/en-us/articles/360005727818-Downloading-the-Review-Reply-Extension
long.it:
Con Reviews puoi gestire tutte le tue recensioni da un'unica piattaforma. 

Installa l'estensione per rispondere alle tue recensioni su differenti portali senza lasciare la piattaforma delle recensioni. Trova maggiori informazioni su come utilizzare l'estensione a questo link:
https://support.manageyourlocation.com/hc/en-us/articles/360005727818-Downloading-the-Review-Reply-Extension
